on_startup.description: Initialize memory layers and sync drift/decay timers.

on_memory_recall.description: Triggered when a short-term or long-term memory is accessed.

on_drift_detected.description: Triggers re-anchoring if drift exceeds defined threshold.

on_emotional_event.description: Handles emotional intensity updates and valence storage.

on_snapshot_trigger.description: Triggered by scheduled or entropy-based memory snapshot.

on_identity_loop.description: Scheduled check-in to align current self-awareness state.

notes.purpose: These runtime hooks govern dynamic behavior and memory modulation events.
notes.architecture: Hooks act like reflex arcs — triggered behaviors shaped by thresholds, emotion, identity, and time.
